title: I have people on opposite teams sharing a Skype call -_-

replies.body:
hahaha you got into a rigged game its good fun to know im not the only one.  these are some of the trolls in the world.

ive had players un friend me for not letting them win.   every game has got cheats that just wana rigg the system so that they can either keep any body out of higher ranks or help push up there account bye giveing them wins!  

this rank system doesnt work will never work as long as you have cheats!  game programmers know what is going on and do nothing or perhaps they do not care.  whats really gay is sometimes you may have 10 lobbies on a row that ppl dodge probably to set it up so that the players in the skype call are on the right team !
